onyomiExamples.meaning: hanging tail (of a traditional Japanese hat), drooping tail

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to hang, to droop, to dangle, to sag, to lower, to pull down, to leave behind (at death), to give, to confer, to drip, to ooze, to trickle, to drop
to dribble, to spill, to suspend, to hang down, to slouch, to dangle
sauce (esp. soy or mirin-based dipping sauce), hanging, something hanging (flap, lappet, etc.), (kendo) loin guard, kanji radical enclosing the top-left corner of a character, -ass, -head
to close in on (30 years of age, etc.), to approach, to get close to
